item.description:
this is option # 2
(as compared to option #1 which is extreme bowling on friday night from 9pm till midnight)

This going to be on sunday feb 28, starting at 6pm.

Each game is $2, and shoe rental is required, so maybe you can bowl 3 games for total of $10 .

Cash bar on premises, and really great example of bowling alley food is available here too!!!

Maybe we can do our own make your own birthday sundaes or bring in a birthday cake for whoevers birthday is nearest . .

If this meetup interests you, please sign up for one or the other or even both, but only one of these options is going to take place, based on the # of signups . .

so if you signup, please plan on really being there . . there is no prepay required, but a headcount is needed to reserve lanes . . .

Thanks for your interest.

glennn
cell 203-314-5604
item.how_to_find_us: Ask front desk for Meet up groups lanes

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Circle Lanes, sunday bowling
